title: Learner Adaptation Strategy Development in Remote Education Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital device proficiency and language education experience
context.additional_context: A course for in-service professionals to improve language proficiency, featuring a blended learning environment utilizing digital devices. The core objective is to analyze and support learners' adaptation processes through participatory observational research.

learning_goals: Learners can conduct at least three effective language practice sessions using remote education tools (e.g., video conferencing systems, digital collaboration platforms).
Learners can recognize communication barriers in technology-mediated environments and develop at least two adaptive strategies to overcome them.
Learners can compare differences between traditional and digital learning environments and design at least one blended learning approach suited to their learning style.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
